ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagen press
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process mutagenic fruits into crude soups at a stove or mutagenics Kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: meat Processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cut specific parts of animal meats and sanitize them to create ingredients for mutagenic potions at a butcher table or stove.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mutagenics Kitchen
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a specialized workbench with a cauldron to further process mutagenic products.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mutanite dissolving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process mutanite into mutagenic soups at a mutagenics kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagen cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process mutagenic animal products into mutagenic soups at a mutagenics kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mutagen mixing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process and purifies mutagenic soup to make a controlled potion at a mutagenics kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biome Mutagenic Potions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process and purifies mutagenic soups and combine them with animal parts to make mutagenic potions intended for mutations suited for specific environments at a mutagenics kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Roles Mutagenic Potions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process and purifies mutagenic soups and combine them with animal parts to make mutagenic potions intended for mutations suited for specific roles at a mutagenics kitchen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Genus Mutagenic Potions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Process and purifies mutagenic soups and combine them with animal parts to make mutagenic potions for mutations from a genetic family at a mutagenics kitchen.
